TopicTitle: I need help on Iva Creating!

Articles.Content: I really need help on making Iva mods.

Install Unity 2019.4.18f (not sure it it's the correct version but works for me), create a project, install a PartTools unitupackage (see PartTools forum thread, I'm always messing this up). Open the PartTools window, set GameData directory and you will be able to spawn KSP internal spaces and props into Unity editor and drag/rotate/resize props as you wish. If you are struggling with the camera and zoom press Shift + F it will focus the camera on an object you are working with (this thing took me years to figure out).
